title: 5 Tips to Maximize Your Garden Yield
itunes:title: 5 Tips to Maximize Your Garden Yield & Beat Overwhelm
description: Use these 5 tips to maximize your garden yield (aka more vegetables) & beat overwhelm. How to ensure you have a continual harvest of fresh vegetables rather than a huge glut all at once for your non-preserving crops, how to make sure you don't miss crucial planting times, and how to increase the harvest of your existing plants so you don't have to plant as many. Plus, use my garden weeding tip to help you stay on top of it without wanting to pull your hair out. Grab all the links & resources, including my FREE monthly seasonal planting guide at https://melissaknorris.com/181

Plus, use my garden weeding tip to help you stay on top of it without wanting to pull your hair out. itunes:author: Melissa K. Norris
